All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ChangeNameDialog
Dialog fragment that allows users to change their display name.
Comment
The Comment class represents a single comment entry for a mood event.
Constants
 
EmotionalState
Defines the set of possible emotional states for mood events in the application.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FeedFragment
The FeedFragment class displays a feed of mood events, either from the user's history or from followed users.
FeedTest
 
FeedViewModel
ViewModel for the FeedFragment that manages UI data related to mood events.
FollowHelper
A helper class for managing user follow relationships and follow requests using Firebase Firestore.
FollowHelperTest
 
FriendsFragment
Fragment that displays and manages the user's friends.
LoginFragment
Fragment that handles user login functionality.
LoginSignupTest
UI Test to verify the functionality of the Login and Register fragments.
MainActivity
Main activity that serves as the entry point for the application.
MapFragment
 
MoodEvent
The MoodEvent class represents a single mood event entry in the application.
MoodEvent.AddCommentCallback
Listener for AddCommentCallbacks
MoodEventAdapter
Adapter for displaying MoodEvent objects in a RecyclerView.
MoodEventAdapter.OnItemClickListener
 
MoodEventTest
 
MoodInfoDialogFragment
A DialogFragment that allows the user to view, edit, and delete a MoodEvent.
MoodList
The MoodList class manages a collection of MoodEvent objects and interacts with Firestore to perform CRUD operations.
MoodList.MoodListListener
Callback listener to handle returning data from asyn events
MoodListTest
 
NewEventTest
 
NewFragment
The NewFragment class provides the UI for creating new mood events.
PersistentUserTest
UI Test to verify the functionality of the Login and Register fragments.
ProfileFragment
Fragment that displays and manages the user's profile information.
ProfileTest
UI Test to verify the functionality of the Profile fragment.
QrCodeDialog
 
QueryType
Defines the various query types used by the MoodList class to retrieve and filter mood events.
RegistrationFragment
Fragment that handles user registration functionality.
RequestsBottomSheet
Bottom sheet dialog fragment that displays pending friend requests.
TestHelper
 
User
Class to represent a User stored in Firestore.
User.ActiveUserUpdatedListener
 
User.OnUserLoadedListener
 
UserAdapter
Adapter for displaying user items in a RecyclerView.
UserAdapter.OnUserClickListener
Interface for handling user item click events
UserAdapter.UserViewHolder
ViewHolder for the user item views
UserSearch
A utility class for searching user usernames in a Firestore database based on a substring match.
UserSearchAdapter
Adapter class for displaying a list of usernames in the user search results.
UserSearchAdapter.OnUserClickListener
 
UserSearchFragment
Fragment that provides a UI for searching users by their username.
UserSearchTest
 
Utils
 
ViewProfileFragment
 
ViewProfileTest
UI Test to verify the functionality of the View Profile Fragment.
